name: ear training 2
description:
(please use latest chrome . the code is not cross-browser)

i recently started music . i want to sharpen my ears . and be able to bring the music in my head into reality . that's why i created this game. it is good for note identification and memory improvement . 

special thanks to my friend Emad Ghasemi for his contribution on code and teaching me good object oriented  practices so i  become able to handle writing this game. 

source code available on github.
